entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Meadow Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:26 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -19.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Meadow Lake Airport 05:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -19.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -23.6°C
Wind: E 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow this morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
